assessment_item.title: LC4VMA-Q4-சுவாசித்தலில் ஈடுபடும் நொதிகள் அதிகமாக காணுமிடம்
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

சுவாசித்தலில் ஈடுபடும் நொதிகள் அதிகமாக காணுமிடம்                   

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

மைட்டோகாண்ட்ரியா மேட்ரிக்ஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2042"},{"text":"

சவ்வு இடைவெளிப்பகுதி

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2043"},{"text":"

 கிரிஸ்டே

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2053"},{"text":"

வெளிச்சவ்வு

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2058"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LC4VMA-Q4-சுவாசித்தலில் ஈடுபடும் நொதிகள் அதிகமாக காணுமிடம்","title":"LC4VMA-Q4-சுவாசித்தலில் ஈடுபடும் நொதிகள் அதிகமாக காணுமிடம்","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
